name: RunButNotBeDead: Holiday Twist
description:
Hi

It's the game for 32bit Holiday Jam 2021 And I ... don't finish it, cause i kinda lazy /ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\ I am just beginner in game development, it's my second game Don't be very biased. ㅇㅅㅇ

Rifle and Music i made before game jam start

Game tips :

- Control:

WASD - movement ;

Space - jump ;

LeftClick - shoot ;

"1" - empty hands ;

"2" - rifle ;

"3" - pistol ;

- Green barrels - healing

In game Enemies are kinda dumb.  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
